tool_description: API to help with word games.
name: word-finder
title: word-finder

api_list.name: root
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: word-rank
api_list.description: Returns numeric ranking for how frequently used the word is.  Lower ranking are more frequently used words.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com/word-rank/pizza"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com/word-rank/{word}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: word-score
api_list.description: Returns the score for the specified word based on the letter points of a popular word game.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com/word-score/pizza"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: word-finder-plus
api_list.description: Returns a list of matching words, the score of the word based on a popular word game's letter points, along with the ranking of the word with respect to frequency of use in the English language.  Lower ranking words are used more frequently.   Number of words to return is optional.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com/word-finder-plus/s***s/*/qxz/5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com/word-finder-plus/{valid_letters}/{misplaced_letters}/{excluded_letters}/{number_of_words_to_return}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: random-words
api_list.description: Returns a random list of words containing a specific number of letters.  For example, return a random list of ten five-letter words.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com/random-words/5/20"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: word-finder
api_list.description: Returns a list of words based on known letters, misplaced letters, and excluded letters.  Can optionally enter a number to limit the number of words returned.  If no misplaced letters or excluded letters, enter an * for that parameter.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com/word-finder/s***t/*/q/5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-finder3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
